welcome.title: Welcome to Health Check
welcome.subtitle: Get a quick assessment of your health with our advanced kiosk system. Touch the screen to begin your health check journey.
welcome.disclaimer: This tool is designed for general wellness screening and informational purposes only. It is not a medical device and does not provide a diagnosis. If you are experiencing symptoms or have any health concerns, please consult a physician.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.subtitle: Please provide your personal information to create your profile, process your results accurately, and receive your health check results. Your submission confirms your consent.
personalInfo.consent: I consent to share my personal information and receive my health check results
personalInfo.agreement: I understand and agree to the Confidentiality & Non-Disclosure

errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.invalidPhone: Please enter a valid phone number
errors.consentRequired: You must consent to share your information
errors.agreementRequired: You must agree to the Confidentiality & Non-Disclosure Agreement

personalInfo.footer: © 2025 Health Check Kiosk. Touch screen to interact.
personalInfo.medicalDisclaimer: This is an automated health assessment. It does not replace professional medical advice.

faceScan.title: Face Scan
faceScan.subtitle: Please position your face inside the frame until the corners turn green. Stay still, breathe normally, and keep a neutral facial expression. We will estimate your wellness indicators through the camera. Click the "Start" button when you're ready, and wait until the green bar completes and "Calculating" appears.
faceScan.scanCompleteSubtitle: Here are your vital signs captured from the face scan:
faceScan.instructions: Position your face in front of the camera
faceScan.instructionsCenter: Center your face in the camera

userInfo.title: Tell Us About Yourself
userInfo.subtitle: Please select your age and gender to help us personalize your health check.

complaint.title: What brings you in today?
complaint.subtitle: Please select your health concerns (select all that apply):
complaint.placeholder: Describe your symptoms or health concerns...
complaint.optional: This information is optional but will help provide better recommendations.

assessment.title: Health Assessment
assessment.subtitle: Please answer the following questions to help us understand your health better.
assessment.completeSubtitle: The questionnaires are completed. You can continue to the next step.
assessment.noQuestionnairesRequired: No questionnaires were required based on the initial assessment.
assessment.question: Question

healthSummary.title: Health Assessment Summary
healthSummary.name: Name:
healthSummary.importantNotice: This is an automated health assessment summary. It is not a medical diagnosis. Please consult with a healthcare provider for proper medical evaluation and treatment.
healthSummary.disclaimer: This tool is designed for general wellness screening and informational purposes only. It is not a medical device and does not provide a diagnosis. If you are experiencing symptoms or have any health concerns, please consult a physician.

assessmentTexts.confirmedDescription: The AI-based facial analysis did not detect abnormal RR interval patterns associated with the cardiac conditions screened. This screening tool analyzes facial video for RR interval patterns and is not equivalent to diagnostic tests. A negative result does not rule out cardiac conditions.
assessmentTexts.suspectedPattern: Potential {conditionName} pattern detected; questionnaire does not support finding
assessmentTexts.suspectedDescription: The AI detected RR interval patterns consistent with potential {conditionName}, but questionnaire responses did not indicate typical symptoms. A single abnormal pattern may occur due to technical factors during screening.
assessmentTexts.suspectedRecommendation: Moderate risk assessment (YELLOW). Consider repeating screening 5 additional times to establish pattern consistency.
assessmentTexts.highRiskPattern: Potential {conditionName} pattern detected; questionnaire supports finding
assessmentTexts.highRiskDescription: The AI-based facial analysis detected RR interval patterns consistent with potential {conditionName}. The patient's responses to the targeted questionnaire indicated symptoms and risk factors that align with this finding. While this screening combines AI pattern recognition with symptom assessment, it is not diagnostic and requires clinical confirmation
assessmentTexts.highRiskRecommendation: High risk assessment (RED). Clinical evaluation recommended to assess for {conditionName} using standard diagnostic protocols.
assessmentTexts.disclaimerText: This screening tool supplements clinical judgment only. It uses facial video analysis to detect potential RR interval patterns. A single screening provides preliminary information only. Positive findings require clinical correlation and diagnostic testing. Negative findings do not rule out cardiac conditions. Apply professional judgment when interpreting results.

requestReading.title: Request Reading
requestReading.defaultMessageText: Your care provider has requested you take a quick health scan using your phone.
requestReading.clickLink: Please click the link below to be taken to the vitals scanning page.

agreement.title: Carevision Confidentiality & Non-Disclosure Notice

confidential.title: 1. Confidential & Proprietary:
confidential.content: All content, design, software, features, workflow, and technology of this demo are the exclusive intellectual property and trade secrets of Carevision. The entire solution is confidential and protected.

items.0: You may not take any photos, videos, or screen recordings of the demo.
items.1: You may not copy, store, share, or transmit any part of the solution or user experience.
items.2: You may not build or attempt to build any product or solution based on this experience, even if modified.

derivativeUse.title: 3. No Derivative Use:
derivativeUse.content: Any effort to create, support, or contribute to the development of a competing or similar solution—directly or indirectly—based on any idea, flow, feature, or element of this demo is strictly forbidden.

reverseEngineering.title: 4. No Reverse Engineering:
reverseEngineering.content: You may not decompile, disassemble, reverse engineer, analyze, or extract functionality or architecture from this demo in any form.

nonDisclosure.title: 5. Non-Disclosure:
nonDisclosure.content: You may not disclose, discuss, or share any information about the Carevision solution with any third party, including your organization, partners, or collaborators.

legalEnforcement.title: 6. Legal Enforcement:
legalEnforcement.content: Any violation will be treated as unauthorized use and misappropriation of trade secrets, and may result in immediate legal action, including injunctive relief and claims for damages.

agreement.footer: This is a confidential demonstration. Unauthorized use or replication is strictly prohibited.

common.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong, please try again later!
